tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Probability with Playing Cards and Venn Diagrams
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: Probability of compound events. The Addition Rule. Common Core Standard 457 S-CP.7

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview:
In your last calculation, 'probability jacks or hearts' I think there should be added something more :
either you include jack of hearts to that : [P (J and/or hearts)] or you do not include the jack of hearts : [P (J or hearts)], meaning that it can not be both jack and hearts
in the last case there should be substracted 2 in stead of 1 in the ending sum : P (J or hearts) = (13+4-2) / 52
if i﻿ would be making a mistake saying this please notify me on that :-)
thanks for educating me! :-)
wow,﻿
dude is ask me﻿ the same thing right now

Thank you, Mr. Khan, for providing the Common Core Standards. I know it is an extra step for you, but this teacher appreciates it. (Yes, as a teacher, I enjoy your videos. Sometimes, it makes me rethink﻿ how I want to teach the same subject to reach my students.)
Can you﻿ just fucking tell me when the probability of getting a king or something. FUCK
at﻿ 1:00 he draws king before queen
Build Your Passive Income With﻿ An Automated Internet Marketing System [ goo.gl\RXIRC]
haha okay this are the basics ..﻿ now make a video how to count cards in blackjack :)
know more about﻿ probability
- My math prof said that Poincare was probably the last﻿ mathematician who had mastered all the known mathematics of his day.
Thank you! You﻿ are doing a great job. If i get rich, I'll contribute funds to your cause.

this video is nice enough. however, why are khanacademy videos coming up as the highest rated no matter what probability/statistics videos I search for. This is impossible. Either khanacademy﻿ is telling people to vote for them, or google/youtube is weighting in favor of khanacademy videos.
Venn diagram n. A diagram using circles to represent sets, with﻿ the position and overlap of the circles indicating the relationships between the sets.
if you already knew this then sorry, i don't understand what you are trying to say. it's b/c you said P (J﻿ and/or H) and the video is only calculating P(J or H)
enjoying﻿ it 100%.
I love﻿ u sal
counting﻿ cards 101 :)

"I know almost everything﻿ about math"
I'm calling bullshit
Sal is emphasizing that he is using inclusive "or" rather than an exclusive "or". Notice he explains how you count that middle section both if you just add the jacks and the﻿ hearts.

don't know if you care anymore but P(J or H) means that you are adding the probability of getting a heart or a jack. Thing is that the probability of a heart includes the jack of hearts meaning if you add 13 H + 4 J together, you are adding the jack of hearts twice. However we want to have only one jack of hearts once (b/c a deck of 52 only has one) so we subtract only 1 not 2 b/c﻿ we still want ONE jack of heart to fulfill the conditions of P (J or H). does that made sense?

"I know almost everythng about math" Humble ain't he? I bet he will be amazed when he finds out he knows almost nothing about it. There is not a single person in the world who knows "almost everything" about any topic. We must not forget how small we are compared with Nature. How can we even say we know﻿ a little about any topic? Nature is so complex, yet humans tend to think they are god. Rethink about your place in the universe.
The 81st like is﻿ me!!
Gays check﻿ out how to become popular Russian invention /watch?v=Y-pztzYMasA&feature=g-upl&context=G2f02875AUAAAAAAAAAA

Guys, this video is for every one; especially those who are scared of maths. Such people have to be taught every bit of maths to make them comfortable with maths. We have to appreciate Salman Khan for his effort to provide free education in all﻿ possible subjects to the entire world. He has received several awards for his cause to educate every person on this earth, and also received funds from Google, Microsoft, and some other.
